channel.title: Problem With Range on my server!
channel.description: Well we had our server up for like 2 weeks now and only just noticed this problem. Training range is fine on monsters goes up how i want it but then as soon as they do ranging in pk areas it puts their defence up as well, i have tested changing range styles, rapid, accurate and long range but it does it for all of them only in pk though, anyone know how to sort it.

item.title: Problem With Range on my server!
item.dc:creator: @blk_joe12 blk joe12
item.description:
@blk_joe12 wrote:

umm well all i know you have to modify client.java look for range with ctrl+f and it should be around there somewhere hope i helped:\

Read full topic
item.source: Problem With Range on my server!
